citations.narrative:
Facility does not have a contingency plan available for review during inspection. Covered species are generally not
maintained on campus, so there is no impact to the welfare of the animals. Research facilities must develop, document,
and follow an appropriate plan to provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of their
animals in the event of an emergency or disaster by July 5, 2022 and train their employees on the plan.
Correct by 6 August, 2023
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with IACUC chair.
n

narrative:
2.38(l) 
   
Miscellaneous. 
Facility does not have a contingency plan available for review during inspection. Covered species are generally not 
maintained on campus, so there is no impact to the welfare of the animals. Research facilities must develop, document, 
and follow an appropriate plan to provide for the humane handling, treatment, transportation, housing, and care of their 
animals in the event of an emergency or disaster by July 5, 2022 and train their employees on the plan. 
 
Correct by 6 August, 2023 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with IACUC chair. 
 
 n
